import React, {useContext} from 'react' import CartContext from './CartContext' const CartItem = ({item, cantidad}) => { const {id, title, imagen, price}=item const {deleteItem}= useContext(CartContext) return (
{title}
{/* */} Cantidad: <>&nspb {cantidad} {/* */}
Total $ {price *cantidad }
) } export default CartItem
